content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Sooronbay Jeenbekov

, November 2017.]]
This is a list of international presidential trips made by Sooronbay Jeenbekov, the 5th President of Kyrgyzstan.
2017
{| class="wikitable" style="margin: 1em auto 1em auto"
! width="120" |Country
! width="100" |Areas visited
! width="90" |Date(s)
! width="550" |Notes
|-
| Russia
|Moscow
|November 28–29
|State Visit. Met with Vladimir Putin.
|-

|Minsk
|November 29–30
|Working Visit. Attended the CTSO Summit.
|-
| Uzbekistan
|Tashkent
|December 13
|Official Visit.
|-
| Kazakhstan
|Astana
|December 25
|State Visit.
|-
| Russia
|Moscow
|December 26–27
|Took part in the informal summit of Heads of State of the CIS.
|}
